  1. Geyser
  2. Anticheat Compatibility
The AntiCheats listed below have been categorized based on their compatibility with Geyser. This is a community-compiled list and does not indicate any endorsement from GeyserMC. Use them at your own risk!

AntiCheat compatibility reports

Full Compatibility (Checks Bedrock Players Accurately)

  • AntiAura (Paid) - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
  • Themis - Last Updated on 15th Jun 2022
  • Negativity V2 (Paid) - Last Updated on 21st March 2022
  • SoaromaSAC - Last Updated on 27th March 2022
  • Spartan: Bedrock Edition (Paid) - Last Updated on 22nd May 2023

Partially Compatible (Does not Check/Ignores Bedrock Players)

  • AAC (Paid) - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
  • Flappy Anticheat - Last Updated on 14th September 2021
  • GrimAC - Last Updated on 24th March 2022
  • Intave (Paid) Requires GeyserMC addon - Last Updated on 24th October 2022
  • Matrix (Paid) - Last updated on 2nd September 2021
  • Spartan: Java Edition (Paid) - Last Updated on 22nd May 2023
  • Vulcan (Paid) - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
  • Verus (Paid) - Last Updated on 13th July 2022

Incompatible (False Positives on Bedrock Players, no Compatibility at All)

  • AntiCheatReloaded - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
  • Negativity V1 - Last Updated on 21st March 2022
  • NoCheatPlus (Compat NCP is an addon that enables Partial Compatibility) - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
  • GodsEye (GodsEyeGeyserMC is an addon that enables Partial Compatibility) (Paid) - Last Updated on 21st March 2022
  • Kauri (Paid) - Last Updated on 21st March 2022
  • Reflex (Paid) - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
  • Wraith (Paid) - Last Updated on 19th August 2021
